description: A body of structured information describing some topic(s) of interest.

alias.description: An alternate (short) name of the item.

title.description: A descriptive name of the item.

version.description: The version identifier of a creative work embodied by the item.

versionSpecifications.description: Log or record of all notable changes made to the item compared to it's previous version.

license.description: A license document that applies to this content.

releaseDate.description: The release date of the resource.

DOI.description: Persistent and interoperable Digital Object Identifier (DOI) for this content.

custodian.description: Person entrusted with guarding and keeping the resource.

mainContact.description: Person with expert knowledge about the resource and therefore can provide relevant information.

contributor.description: Person collecting, managing, distributing, or otherwise contributing to the development of the resource.

ethicsApproval.description: Characteristics of the existing ethics approval.

fundingInfo.description: Information about financial support of this content.

isNewVersionOf.description: Indicates that this content is a new edition (modified or updated) of a previously released content.

isPartOf.description: Lists larger research projects in which context this content was created.

studiedSubjectAndOrTissueSample.description: Lists subjects and/or tissue samples that were studied for this content.

focusOfStudy.description: Lists the foci (study target, temporal subject information) of the study conducted in the resource.

isDescribedBy.description: Publication(s) and/or file(s) that document the scope of the project.

isDerivedFrom.description: Lists the publication(s) used to produce the input to the resource.

usedMethodsAndOrParadigms.description: Lists the method(s) and/or paradigm(s) used to produce the content of the resource.
